locale.message: BPress Import Plugin
Import articles into journal from BPress XML.

Command-line tool for importing BPress XML article data into OJS Usage: {$scriptName} journalPath userName directoryName journalPath specifies the journal into which the articles should be imported. userName specifies which journal user should be assigned the imported articles. directoryName includes Bpress XML articles to be imported along with associated PDF galleys and supplementary files.
